fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs no FPU operation. This instruction takes up space in the instruction stream but does not affect the FPU or machine context, except the EIP register and the FPU Instruction Pointer.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: This instruction’s operation is the same in non-64-bit modes and 64-bit mode.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
